wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Stuart Widdowson (born 27 March 1974) is an English cricketer.  Widdowson is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm medium pace.  He was born at Leicester, Leicestershire.
Widdowson represented the Leicestershire Cricket Board in a single List A match against the Durham Cricket Board in the 2000 NatWest Trophy.  In his only List A match he scored 11 runs and with the ball he took a single wicket at a cost of 12 runs.He currently plays club cricket for Kegworth Town Cricket Club in the Leicestershire Premier Cricket League.
